--- title: "Week-7: Code-along" author: "Insert your name here" date: "2023-10-16" output: html_document: df_print: paged pdf_document: default --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) ``` ::: # II. Code to edit and execute using the Code-along.Rmd file
## ggplot(data = [dataset], mapping = aes(x = [x-variable], y = [y-variable])) + geom_xxx() + other options ### 1. Load library and dataset. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # Enter code here library(tidyverse) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ── ✔ dplyr 1.1.2 ✔ readr 2.1.4 ✔ forcats 1.0.0 ✔ stringr 1.5.0 ✔ ggplot2 3.4.3 ✔ tibble 3.2.1 ✔ lubridate 1.9.2 ✔ tidyr 1.3.0 ✔ purrr 1.0.2 ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ℹ Use the conflicted package () to force all conflicts to become errors ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(palmerpenguins) ``` :::
### 2. Efficiently use GGPLOT ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot(penguins, #Start with the penguins data fram aes(x = bill_depth_mm, # Map bill depth to the x-axi y = bill_length_mm, # Map bill length to the y-axi colour = species, #Map species to the colour of each point shape = species, #map islands to diff shapes size = body_mass_g, #map body mass to diff sizes alpha = flipper_length_mm)) + #map flipper length to diff transparency geom_point() #Represent each observation with a plot ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: Removed 2 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`). ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} scale_colour_viridis_d() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` aesthetics: colour axis_order: function break_info: function break_positions: function breaks: waiver call: call clone: function dimension: function drop: TRUE expand: waiver get_breaks: function get_breaks_minor: function get_labels: function get_limits: function guide: legend is_discrete: function is_empty: function labels: waiver limits: NULL make_sec_title: function make_title: function map: function map_df: function n.breaks.cache: NULL na.translate: TRUE na.value: NA name: waiver palette: function palette.cache: NULL position: left range: environment rescale: function reset: function scale_name: viridis_d train: function train_df: function transform: function transform_df: function super: ``` ::: :::
### 3. Mapping ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot(penguins) + aes(x = bill_depth_mm, y = bill_length_mm, size = body_mass_g, alpha = flipper_length_mm) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: Removed 2 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`). ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
### 4. Setting ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot(penguins) + aes(x = bill_depth_mm, y = bill_length_mm) + geom_point(size = 2, alpha = 0.5) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: Removed 2 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`). ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
### 5.Facte ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot(penguins) + aes(x = bill_depth_mm, y = bill_length_mm, color = species) + geom_point() + #1 facet_grid(species ~ island) #2 facet_grid(species ~ sex) [USING THIS AS EXAMPLE BELOW] #3 facet_grid(sex ~ specie) #4 facet_wrap(~ species) #5 facet_wrap(~ species, ncol = 2) #6 facet_grid(. ~ species) facet_grid(species ~ sex) + scale_color_viridis_d() + guides(color = "none") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: Removed 2 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`). ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
### 6. Numerical Varibles Graphs ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(openintro) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Loading required package: airports ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Loading required package: cherryblossom ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Loading required package: usdata ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} loans <- loans_full_schema %>% select(loan_amount, interest_rate, term, grade, state, annual_income, homeownership, debt_to_income) glimpse(loans) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Rows: 10,000 Columns: 8 $ loan_amount 28000, 5000, 2000, 21600, 23000, 5000, 24000, 20000, 20… $ interest_rate 14.07, 12.61, 17.09, 6.72, 14.07, 6.72, 13.59, 11.99, 1… $ term 60, 36, 36, 36, 36, 36, 60, 60, 36, 36, 60, 60, 36, 60,… $ grade C, C, D, A, C, A, C, B, C, A, C, B, C, B, D, D, D, F, E… $ state NJ, HI, WI, PA, CA, KY, MI, AZ, NV, IL, IL, FL, SC, CO,… $ annual_income 90000, 40000, 40000, 30000, 35000, 34000, 35000, 110000… $ homeownership MORTGAGE, RENT, RENT, RENT, RENT, OWN, MORTGAGE, MORTGA… $ debt_to_income 18.01, 5.04, 21.15, 10.16, 57.96, 6.46, 23.66, 16.19, 3… ``` ::: :::
::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} #Historgram: ggplot(loans, aes(x = loan_amount, fill = homeownership)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 5000, alpha = 0.5) + labs(x = "Loan amount ($)",y = "Frequency",title = "Amounts of Lending Club loans") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #{When fill w a categorical varible: facet_wrap(~ homeownership, nrow = 3)} #Density plot ggplot(loans, aes(x = loan_amount, fill = homeownership)) + geom_density(adjust = 2, alpha = 0.5) + labs(x = "Loan amount ($)",y = "Density",title = "Amounts of Lending Club loans") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-2.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #Box plot ggplot(loans, aes(x = interest_rate)) +geom_boxplot() +labs(x = "Interest rate (%)",y = NULL, title = "Interest rates of Lending Club loans") + theme( axis.ticks.y = element_blank(), axis.text.y = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-3.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #Scatterplot ggplot(loans, aes(x = debt_to_income, y = interest_rate)) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: Removed 24 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`). ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-4.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #Hex plot ggplot(loans %>% filter(debt_to_income < 100), aes(x = debt_to_income, y = interest_rate)) + geom_hex() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-5.png){width=672} ::: :::
### 7. Categoric varibles graph ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # Segmented bar plot ggplot(loans, aes(x = homeownership, fill = grade)) + geom_bar() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # {or: geom_bar(position = "fill")} ggplot(loans, aes(y = homeownership, fill = grade)) + geom_bar(position = "fill") + labs( x = "Proportion", y = "Homeownership", fill = "Grade", title = "Grades of Lending Club loan") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-2.png){width=672} ::: :::
### 8. Setting defaults (Slide #25) ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # First define the function calc_sample_mean <- function(sample_size, our_mean=0, our_sd=1) { sample <- rnorm(sample_size, mean = our_mean, sd = our_sd) mean(sample) } # Call the function calc_sample_mean(sample_size = 10) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 0.27508 ``` ::: :::
### 9. Varied varibles graph ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} #Violin plots ggplot(loans, aes(x = homeownership, y = loan_amount)) + geom_violin() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672} ::: ```{.r .cell-code} #Ridge plots library(ggridges) ggplot(loans, aes(x = loan_amount, y = grade, fill = grade, color = grade)) + geom_density_ridges(alpha = 0.5) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Picking joint bandwidth of 2360 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Code-along-5_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-2.png){width=672} ::: :::
